title: Cannot restore pixel backup after system restore- backup visible in drive on desktop
content:
Pixel 3A XL on Jan version

I backed up my phone in phone settings and verified it was completed as I can see it in https://drive.google.com/drive/backups from my desktop. Then after a factory restore on copy apps and data i clicked next, can't use old phone, then ok (i didn't have the option to restore from cloud as shown in the help section). Then I received the dreaded message "no backups found". 

i can see "Google pixel 3a XL backup 1" (with the #1 being colorful 1 depicting google one) from my desktop google drive. I also see number of apps, about 0.5mb of sms data when previewing. I can also see previously installed apps in the play store so i'm thinking it's there it's just not detecting it. Any ideas?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
